description_translations.en: Collaboratively develop a draft itinerary and budget. Engage participants in brainstorming and refining possible destinations, activities, and cost considerations.
description_translations.es: Desarrollar colaborativamente un borrador de itinerario y presupuesto. Involucrar a los participantes en la generación y refinamiento de ideas sobre posibles destinos, actividades y consideraciones de costos.
description_translations.it: Sviluppa collaborativamente un itinerario e un budget di bozza. Coinvolgi i partecipanti nel brainstorming e nella definizione di possibili destinazioni, attività e considerazioni sui costi.
description_translations.lv: Kopīgi izstrādājiet provizorisku maršrutu un budžetu. Iesaistiet dalībniekus iespējamo galamērķu, aktivitāšu un izmaksu apsvērumu ģenerēšanā un pilnveidošanā.

name_translations.en: Develop a draft travel itinerary and budget
name_translations.es: Desarrollar un borrador de itinerario y presupuesto de viaje
name_translations.it: Sviluppa una bozza di itinerario e budget di viaggio
name_translations.lv: Izstrādājiet ceļojuma maršruta un budžeta projektu

description_translations.en: Collaboratively explore potential destinations, activities, and costs, and create an initial plan for the trip.
description_translations.es: Explorar colaborativamente posibles destinos, actividades y costos, y crear un plan inicial para el viaje.
description_translations.it: Esplora collaborativamente le possibili destinazioni, attività e costi, e crea un piano iniziale per il viaggio.
description_translations.lv: Kopīgi izpētiet iespējamās galamērķus, aktivitātes un izmaksas un izveidojiet sākotnējo plānu ceļojumam.

name_translations.en: Research and propose possible destinations and activities
name_translations.es: Investigar y proponer posibles destinos y actividades
name_translations.it: Ricerca e proponi possibili destinazioni e attività
name_translations.lv: Izpētiet un ierosiniet iespējamās galamērķus un aktivitātes

description_translations.en: Identify potential destinations and activities that fit participants' preferences and budget. Discuss options and select the most suitable ones.
description_translations.es: Identificar destinos y actividades potenciales que se ajusten a las preferencias y el presupuesto de los participantes. Discutir opciones y seleccionar las más adecuadas.
description_translations.it: Identifica le destinazioni e attività potenziali che soddisfano le preferenze e il budget dei partecipanti. Discuta le opzioni e seleziona quelle più adatte.
description_translations.lv: Identificējiet potenciālos galamērķus un aktivitātes, kas atbilst dalībnieku vēlmēm un budžetam. Apspriediet opcijas un izvēlieties vispiemērotākās.

name_translations.es: Redactar una estimación de presupuesto inicial
name_translations.it: Redigere una stima iniziale del budget

description_translations.en: Estimate the costs for chosen destinations and activities, considering travel, accommodation, and other expenses.
description_translations.es: Estimar los costos de los destinos y actividades elegidos, considerando viajes, alojamiento y otros gastos.
description_translations.it: Stima i costi per le destinazioni e attività scelte, considerando viaggi, alloggio e altre spese.
description_translations.lv: Aprēķiniet izvēlēto galamērķu un aktivitāšu izmaksas, ņemot vērā ceļojumu, izmitināšanu un citus izdevumus.

interlinkers.name: Event Co-designer (ECO)
interlinkers.description: Tool for scheduling and organizing events, suitable for planning activities within the itinerary.

interlinkers.name: Trello
interlinkers.description: Project management tool for organizing tasks and tracking progress on destination and activity selection.

interlinkers.name: Collaborative editor
interlinkers.description: Real-time collaborative document editor, ideal for working on itinerary drafts and budget estimates.
